thread.title: Pimco Sees More BOJ Easing Possible, Favors Long Japanese Bonds
thread.title_full: Pimco Sees More BOJ Easing Possible, Favors Long Japanese Bonds - Bloomberg Business

author: Vincent Del Giudice
title: Pimco Sees More BOJ Easing Possible, Favors Long Japanese Bonds
text:
(Bloomberg) -- Possibility of BOJ expanding record stimulusremains on table, Pimco says.
* Sees longer-dated Japanese govt bonds as attractive * Additional easing likely should there be deflationary shock,
Tomoya Masanao, head of portfolio management for Japan at
Pimco, writes on companyâ€™s website
* More likely scenario is for BOJ to stick to current
quantitative and qualitative easing; would support gains
in JGBs, he writes * Story link
